data.question: What is the chemical formula of the molecule-based magnet discussed in the article?
What are the four magnetic ground states exhibited by [Co(hfac)2]·BNO*?
data.answer: Paramagnetic, antiferromagnetic, forced ferrimagnetic, and field-induced metastable ferrimagnetic

data.question: At what temperature does [Co(hfac)2]·BNO* enter a field-induced ferrimagnetic state?
What is the coercive field of [Co(hfac)2]·BNO* at 2 K?
What is the role of chiral triplet bis(nitroxide) in the synthesis of [Co(hfac)2]·BNO*?
data.answer: It induces the formation of chiral one-dimensional chains.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic interaction between nitroxide radical and CoII ion is ferromagnetic.
What is the Weiss temperature estimated for [Co(hfac)2]·BNO*?
True or False: The compound [Co(hfac)2]·BNO* exhibits quantum tunneling behavior below 2.8 K.
What is the critical field for the AF-FoFi transition in [Co(hfac)2]·BNO*?
True or False: The magnetic phase diagram of [Co(hfac)2]·BNO* shows only two magnetic ground states.
What is the significance of the triclinic P1 space group in the structure of [Co(hfac)2]·BNO*?
data.answer: It indicates the absence of all symmetry in the crystal structure.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic susceptibility of [Co(hfac)2]·BNO* is independent of the applied magnetic field.
What is the role of the Ising character of the Co ion in [Co(hfac)2]·BNO*?
data.answer: It stabilizes the field-induced ferrimagnetic state below 4 K.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic properties of [Co(hfac)2]·BNO* are solely determined by the CoII ion.
What is the effect of temperature on the magnetic susceptibility of [Co(hfac)2]·BNO*?
data.answer: The magnetic susceptibility shows a minimum at 220 K and a peak around 20 K.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic phase diagram of [Co(hfac)2]·BNO* includes a paramagnetic state above 20 K.
What is the significance of the χac‘ peak observed in the ac magnetic susceptibility measurements of [Co(hfac)2]·BNO*?
data.answer: It indicates a frequency-dependent phase transition in the temperature range 4−8 K.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of [Co(hfac)2]·BNO* requires an N2 atmosphere.
What is the role of freshly distilled solvents in the synthesis of [Co(hfac)2]·BNO*?
data.answer: They are used to ensure purity and prevent contamination.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic properties of [Co(hfac)2]·BNO* are unaffected by the presence of enantiomer-pure BNO.
